see I have always loved an HP flash drive and this one was no exception .. have seen a few people claiming that it is 14.5 GB instead of the assigned 16 which is right and robs it one short of 5 stars :) .. but all in all I do not see any quality issues or anything with sturdiness of the material.
The outer cover is good enough to suggest this is an original product, apart from the 1.5 GB gap I am mighty impressed with it.
